data.topic_title: "Artificially intelligent decision-making systems: Balancing autonomy and accountability in the workplace."

user_transcript_evaluation.feedback:
I love the clear thesis statement you've got at the beginning of your paper - it really sets the tone for your argument. 

One area to improve is to work on connecting your ideas more smoothly. Your writing sometimes feels a bit disjointed and jumps around without clear transitions.

To help you get more cohesive, I'd like you to practice writing a few paragraphs that link together smoothly. Can you try writing a short section that uses transitional phrases to guide the reader through your ideas?
